column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I HAVE NO PICS CUZ WE NEVER GOT A PIZZA!! I would give this place a zero if possible. Arrived around 8:00
column2: a bit of confusion as to where to check in for a table for 2
column5: ordered a salad and told pizza would arrive in 15 mins. Salad arrives but 45 mins later the manager comes to the table and says computer was down
column6: pizza will be done in 25-30 mins! WHAT?!! It's now 2 hours since we walked in the door and all we've had are salads at 10:30PM?!! Forget it!! NEVER AGAIN!!Too big for their britches...they really couldn't give a crap.
